title: CSL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for Deputy Manager Posts
description: The Cochin Shipyard Limited (CSL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Deputy Manager Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech can apply for the CSL Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and h...
